verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] " very seriously contemplating " separate trade negotiations with Canada and Mexico , White House economic advisor Larry Kudlow says .
[ARG0: President Trump] is " [ARGM-MNR: very seriously] [V: contemplating] " [ARG1: separate trade negotiations with Canada and Mexico] , White House economic advisor Larry Kudlow says .
[ARG1: President Trump is " very seriously contemplating " separate trade negotiations with Canada and Mexico] , [ARG0: White House economic advisor Larry Kudlow] [V: says] .
